definition: to dive (into water)/(sports) diving/to commit suicide by jumping into water/(fig.) (of stock prices etc) to fall dramatically
to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: B:Did you see his last dive?
sentences.chinese: 他的最後一次跳水你看見了嗎？

sentences.english: Kids dive in at Thousand Island Park, a historic community on New York’s Wellesley Island.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們在千島公園跳水，紐約韋斯利島的傳統活動。

sentences.english: Forward dive is one of the voluntary dives.
sentences.chinese: 向前跳水是規定動作之一。

sentences.english: For China's diving team, nothing speaks louder.
sentences.chinese: 中國的跳水隊，無話可說的“夢之隊”。

sentences.english: Holiday travel market cooling, domestic air fares in advance "high platform diving."
sentences.chinese: 假期旅遊市場降溫，國內機票價格提前“高臺跳水”。

sentences.english: I have been proud to be a member of the national diving squad.
sentences.chinese: 一直以來，我都以自己是跳水國家隊隊員而自豪。

sentences.english: We lost to a Rooney dive.
sentences.chinese: 魯尼的跳水將我們置於死地。

sentences.english: AYou’re right. The diving is very exciting.
sentences.chinese: A你是對的，跳水確實是更令人激動的比賽。

sentences.english: Manufacturing, in particular, is plunging everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是製造業，都在跳水。

sentences.english: Even so, the comments sent stocks into a late-afternoon dive.
sentences.chinese: 即便如此，此番言論還是令股指在尾盤跳水。

sentences.english: The Chinese Diving Team has maintained their leading position in the medal rankings.
sentences.chinese: 中國跳水隊保持了在獎牌榜上的領先地位。

sentences.english: Movement in the diving pool for diving.
sentences.chinese: 跳水運動在跳水池中進行。

sentences.english: Movement in the diving pool for diving.
sentences.chinese: 跳水運動在跳水池中進行。

sentences.english: I like swimming, but I prefer diving.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡游泳，但是更喜歡跳水。

sentences.english: Forward dive: A dive where the diver starts from a position facing the water and spins forward in the air.
sentences.chinese: 一種跳水跳水者伸出腳向前或向上來完成半個後翻。

sentences.english: Forward dive: A dive where the diver starts from a position facing the water and spins forward in the air.
sentences.chinese: 一種跳水跳水者伸出腳向前或向上來完成半個後翻。

definition: (of sales, prices etc) to fall/to drop/decline/slump
stock market index/share price index/abbr. for 股票指數|股票指数[gu3 piao4 zhi3 shu4]
to fall back (of water level or share prices)
